group_1.textCenter: It should be decided on a...

group_1.textLeft: What...?
But...that's how it works already.@Nothing would change.

group_1.textRight: Your group beat the Witch first...@I acknowledge this...
This world is always full of competition,@just like it was that day.
I believe the world of Magical Girls@is much the same.
We hunt our prey... We have to do so to@survive.
As such, "first come, first served" is a @simple and fair way to decide.

group_1.textLeft: B-but, we need a rule that both groups@can agree with...

group_1.textRight: I think Meiyui does have a point.

group_1.textLeft: N-Nanaka, you too?

group_1.textRight: This means if a Witch appears, the Magical@Girl who gets to it first fights it.
And latecomers don't interfere. Makes@sense, yes?

group_1.textLeft: W-well, [chara:302701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302701:cheek_0][chara:302701:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302701:lipSynch_1]I see your point. That's definitely@one method!
Still...
How do you decide who found it first?@Someone has to judge who it was!

group_1.textRight: Each girl judges for herself who came first.

group_1.textLeft: Okay... So that means whoever calls@dibs on the Witch gets to fight it?
That seems like a good recipe for lots@of arguments...
What do you think, Ayame?
When Hazuki says there'll be arguin',@that's for sure what's gonna happen!
In times like this, there's only one thing@to do!

group_1.textRight: Oh, do you have another suggestion, Ayame?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, yep, yep! Lemme solve it! This is@the best way... I can tell!
Let's just rock, paper, scissors it!

group_1.textRight: Don't make such a big deal out of such a@normal idea.

group_1.textLeft: Still... It is an easy enough method to@resolve an argument.
Good call, Ayame!
[chara:302801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Tee hee!
(Yeah, talk about overprotective...)
[chara:300801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Uwah! You're too loud!
(Oh, here we go... Meiyui's getting all@fired up.)

group_1.textRight: Do you think there's enough time to do@rock, paper, scissors on the battlefield?!

group_1.textLeft: Well, [chara:302701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302701:motion_100][chara:302701:cheek_0][chara:302701:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302701:lipSynch_1]why don't we try it out here?
Like a simulation of sorts. We can time@how long it takes...
...with a little rock, paper, scissors@contest, right here!
